docs.title: Let’s build with Kyronode
docs.text: Kyronode provides reliable validator and infrastructure services for blockchain networks. Secure. Scalable. Always online.

docs.title: 🌐 Mainnet Chains
docs.text: Kyronode makes it easier to test, validate, and explore. Discover the networks we support and start building today.

docs.title: Withdraw rewards and commission from your validator
Delegate to Yourself
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind tx staking delegate $(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000000ubadge --from $WALLET --chain-id bitbadges-1 --fees 0.025ubadge -y

docs.title: Unbond
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind tx staking unbond $(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000000ubadge --from $WALLET --chain-id bitbadges-1 --fees 0.025ubadge -y

docs.title: Validator Details
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind q staking validator $(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)

docs.title: Active Validators List
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind q staking validators -oj --limit=2000 | jq '.validators[] | select(.status=="BOND_STATUS_BONDED")' | jq -r '(.tokens|tonumber/pow(10;6)|floor|tostring) + " " + .description.moniker' | sort -gr | nl

docs.title: Check Validator key
docs.text: [[ $(bitbadgeschaind q staking validator $VALOPER_ADDRESS -oj | jq -r .consensus_pubkey.key) = $(bitbadgeschaind status | jq -r .ValidatorInfo.PubKey.value) ]] && echo -e "Your key status is ok" || echo -e "Your key status is error"

docs.title: Edit Validator
docs.text:
bitbadgeschaind tx staking edit-validator \
--commission-rate 0.05 \
--new-moniker "$MONIKER" \
--identity "" \
--details "Kyronode for all" \
--from $WALLET \
--chain-id bitbadges-1 \
--fees 0.025ubadge \
-y

docs.title: 🚀 Bitbadges Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and run a Bitbadges Node. 🔗 Website | Discord | Twitter

docs.title: 📋 Recommended Specifications
docs.text: Component Minimum Recommended CPU 4 Cores 4+ Cores RAM 8 GB 8+ GB Storage 400 GB SSD 1 TB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04 Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.24.4"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:
# WARNING: Please replace <YOUR_WALLET>, <YOUR_MONIKER>, and <CUSTOM_PORT>
# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
bitbadgeschaind init $MONIKER --chain-id bitbadges-1
bitbadgeschaind config set client chain-id bitbadges-1
bitbadgeschaind config set client node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657

docs.title: Custom Ports
docs.text:
# app.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${APP_PORT}317%g;
s%:8080%:${APP_PORT}080%g;
s%:9090%:${APP_PORT}090%g;
s%:9091%:${APP_PORT}091%g;
s%:8545%:${APP_PORT}545%g;
s%:8546%:${APP_PORT}546%g;
s%:6065%:${APP_PORT}065%g" $HOME/.bitbadgeschain/config/app.toml

# config.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:26658%:${APP_PORT}658%g;
s%:26657%:${APP_PORT}657%g;
s%:6060%:${APP_PORT}060%g;
s%:26656%:${APP_PORT}656%g;
s%^external_address = \"\"%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${APP_PORT}656\"%;
s%:26660%:${APP_PORT}660%g" $HOME/.bitbadgeschain/config/config.toml

docs.title: Create Service File
docs.text:
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/bitbadgeschaind.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=bitbadgeschaind Node
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=$USER
WorkingDirectory=$HOME/.bitbadgeschain
ExecStart=$(which bitbadgeschaind) start --home $HOME/.bitbadgeschain
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=5
LimitNOFILE=65535
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

docs.title: Start Service
docs.text:
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable bitbadgeschaind
sudo systemctl restart bitbadgeschaind && sudo journalctl -u bitbadgeschaind -fo cat

docs.title: Node Synchronize Checker
docs.text:
# Paste this to your terminal
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kyronode/all-about-cosmos/refs/heads/main/Mainnet/Bitbadges/bitbadges-sync.sh)

docs.title: Create or Restore Wallet
docs.text:
Create new wallet and save ur mnemonics securely

bitbadgeschaind keys add $WALLET

If u want to restore use this command

bitbadgeschaind keys add $WALLET --recover

Set keys variable enviroment

WALLET_ADDRESS=$(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET -a)
VALOPER_ADDRESS=$(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)
echo "export WALLET_ADDRESS="$WALLET_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export VALOPER_ADDRESS="$VALOPER_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Create Validator
docs.text:
If ur node has been fully synchronized, then u can create ur validator: Please Change <YOUR_MONIKER><YOUR_IDENTITY><YOUR_WEBSITE><YOUR_DETAILS> with ur own.

cd $HOME
echo "{
  \"pubkey\": {\"@type\": \"/cosmos.crypto.ed25519.PubKey\", \"key\": \"$(bitbadgeschaind tendermint show-validator | grep -Po '\"key\":\s*\"\K[^\"]*')\"},
  \"amount\": \"1000000000ubadge\",
  \"moniker\": \"<YOUR_MONIKER>\",
  \"identity\": \"<YOUR_IDENTITY>\",
  \"website\": \"<YOUR_WEBSITE>\",
  \"security\": \"\",
  \"details\": \"<YOUR_DETAILS>\",
  \"commission-rate\": \"0.05\",
  \"commission-max-rate\": \"0.25\",
  \"commission-max-change-rate\": \"0.01\",
  \"min-self-delegation\": \"1\"
}" > validator.json

# Create a validator using the JSON configuration
bitbadgeschaind tx staking create-validator validator.json \
    --from wallet \
    --chain-id bitbadges-1 \
    --gas-prices 0.025ubadge \
    --gas-adjustment 1.3 \
    --gas auto \
    -y

docs.title: Delete Node
docs.text:
Please backup ur wallet and important file like "priv_validator_key.json" before deleting. 

sudo systemctl stop bitbadgeschaind
sudo systemctl disable bitbadgeschaind
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo rm -rf /etc/systemd/system/bitbadgeschaind.service
sudo rm $(which bitbadgeschaind)
sudo rm -rf $HOME/.bitbadgeschain

docs.title: 💾 Snapshot
docs.text:
To quickly sync your node from the latest snapshot: 

COMING SOON

docs.title: Manual Upgrade
docs.text:
cd $HOME
sudo systemctl stop bitbadgeschaind
wget https://github.com/BitBadges/bitbadgeschain/releases/download/v13/bitbadgeschain-linux-amd64
chmod +x $HOME/bitbadgeschain-linux-amd64
sudo mv bitbadgeschain-linux-amd64 $(bitbadgeschaind)
bitbadgeschaind version
sudo systemctl start bitbadgeschaind && sudo journalctl -u bitbadgeschaind -fo cat

docs.title: Withdraw rewards and commission from your validator
Delegate to Yourself
docs.text: kiichaind tx staking delegate $(kiichaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000000akii --from $WALLET --chain-id oro_1336-1 --fees 1250000000akii -y

docs.title: Create or Restore Wallet
docs.text:
Create new wallet and save ur mnemonics securely

kiichaind keys add $WALLET

docs.title: Create Validator
docs.text:
If ur node has been fully synchronized, then u can create ur validator: Please Change <YOUR_MONIKER><YOUR_IDENTITY><YOUR_WEBSITE><YOUR_DETAILS> with ur own.

cd $HOME
echo "{
  \"pubkey\": {\"@type\": \"/cosmos.crypto.ed25519.PubKey\", \"key\": \"$(kiichaind tendermint show-validator | grep -Po '\"key\":\s*\"\K[^\"]*')\"},
  \"amount\": \"1000000000000000000akii\",
  \"moniker\": \"<YOUR_MONIKER>\",
  \"identity\": \"<YOUR_IDENTITY>\",
  \"website\": \"<YOUR_WEBSITE>\",
  \"security\": \"\",
  \"details\": \"<YOUR_DETAILS>\",
  \"commission-rate\": \"0.05\",
  \"commission-max-rate\": \"0.25\",
  \"commission-max-change-rate\": \"0.01\",
  \"min-self-delegation\": \"1\"
}" > validator.json

# Create a validator using the JSON configuration
kiichaind tx staking create-validator validator.json \
    --from wallet \
    --chain-id oro_1336-1 \
    --gas-prices 1250000000akii \
    --gas-adjustment 1.3 \
    --gas auto \
    -y

docs.title: Delete Node
docs.text:
Please backup ur wallet and important file like "priv_validator_key.json" before deleting. 

sudo systemctl stop kiichaind
sudo systemctl disable kiichaind
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo rm -rf /etc/systemd/system/kiichaind.service
sudo rm $(which kiichaind)
sudo rm -rf $HOME/.kiichain

docs.title: 💾 Snapshot
docs.text:
To quickly sync your node from the latest snapshot: 

COMING SOON

docs.title: Manual Upgrade
docs.text:
cd $HOME
sudo systemctl stop kiichaind
rm -rf kiichain
git clone https://github.com/KiiChain/kiichain.git
cd kiichain
git fetch --tags
git checkout v4.0.0
make build
mv $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind_backup
cp build/kiichaind $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind
chmod +x $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind
kiichaind version
sudo systemctl start kiichaind

VER="1.23.8"

rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:
# WARNING: Please replace <YOUR_WALLET>, <YOUR_MONIKER>, and <CUSTOM_PORT>
# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Download Binary
docs.text:
cd $HOME
rm -rf kiichain
git clone https://github.com/KiiChain/kiichain.git
cd kiichain
git checkout v4.0.0
make install

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
kiichaind init $MONIKER --chain-id oro_1336-1
kiichaind config set client chain-id oro_1336-1
kiichaind config set client node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657

docs.title: Custom Ports
docs.text:
# app.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${APP_PORT}317%g;
s%:8080%:${APP_PORT}080%g;
s%:9090%:${APP_PORT}090%g;
s%:9091%:${APP_PORT}091%g;
s%:8545%:${APP_PORT}545%g;
s%:8546%:${APP_PORT}546%g;
s%:6065%:${APP_PORT}065%g" $HOME/.kiichain/config/app.toml

# config.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:26658%:${APP_PORT}658%g;
s%:26657%:${APP_PORT}657%g;
s%:6060%:${APP_PORT}060%g;
s%:26656%:${APP_PORT}656%g;
s%^external_address = \"\"%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${APP_PORT}656\"%;
s%:26660%:${APP_PORT}660%g" $HOME/.kiichain/config/config.toml

docs.title: Create Service File
docs.text:
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/kiichaind.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=kiichaind Node
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=$USER
WorkingDirectory=$HOME/.kiichain
ExecStart=$(which kiichaind) start --home $HOME/.kiichain
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=5
LimitNOFILE=65535
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

docs.title: Start Service
docs.text:
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable kiichaind
sudo systemctl restart kiichaind && sudo journalctl -u kiichaind -fo cat

docs.title: Node Synchronize Checker
docs.text:
# Paste this to your terminal
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kyronode/Testnet/main/kiichain-sync.sh)

docs.title: Create or Restore Wallet
docs.text:
Create new wallet and save ur mnemonics securely

kiichaind keys add $WALLET

If u want to restore use this command

kiichaind keys add $WALLET --recover

docs.title: Create Validator
docs.text:
If ur node has been fully synchronized, then u can create ur validator: Please Change <YOUR_MONIKER><YOUR_IDENTITY><YOUR_WEBSITE><YOUR_DETAILS> with ur own.

cd $HOME
echo "{
  \"pubkey\": {\"@type\": \"/cosmos.crypto.ed25519.PubKey\", \"key\": \"$(kiichaind tendermint show-validator | grep -Po '\"key\":\s*\"\K[^\"]*')\"},
  \"amount\": \"1000000000000000000akii\",
  \"moniker\": \"<YOUR_MONIKER>\",
  \"identity\": \"<YOUR_IDENTITY>\",
  \"website\": \"<YOUR_WEBSITE>\",
  \"security\": \"\",
  \"details\": \"<YOUR_DETAILS>\",
  \"commission-rate\": \"0.05\",
  \"commission-max-rate\": \"0.25\",
  \"commission-max-change-rate\": \"0.01\",
  \"min-self-delegation\": \"1\"
}" > validator.json

# Create a validator using the JSON configuration
kiichaind tx staking create-validator validator.json \
    --from wallet \
    --chain-id oro_1336-1 \
    --gas-prices 1250000000akii \
    --gas-adjustment 1.3 \
    --gas auto \
    -y

docs.title: Delete Node
docs.text:
Please backup ur wallet and important file like "priv_validator_key.json" before deleting. 

sudo systemctl stop kiichaind
sudo systemctl disable kiichaind
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo rm -rf /etc/systemd/system/kiichaind.service
sudo rm $(which kiichaind)
sudo rm -rf $HOME/.kiichain

docs.title: 💾 Snapshot
docs.text:
To quickly sync your node from the latest snapshot: 

COMING SOON

docs.title: Manual Upgrade
docs.text:
cd $HOME
sudo systemctl stop kiichaind
rm -rf kiichain
git clone https://github.com/KiiChain/kiichain.git
cd kiichain
git fetch --tags
git checkout v4.0.0
make build
mv $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind_backup
cp build/kiichaind $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind
chmod +x $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind
kiichaind version
sudo systemctl start kiichaind

docs.title: Withdraw rewards and commission from your validator
Delegate to Yourself
docs.text: kiichaind tx staking delegate $(kiichaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000000akii --from $WALLET --chain-id oro_1336-1 --fees 1250000000akii -y

docs.title: Unbond
docs.text: kiichaind tx staking unbond $(kiichaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000000akii --from $WALLET --chain-id oro_1336-1 --fees 12500000000akii -y

docs.title: Validator Details
docs.text: kiichaind q staking validator $(kiichaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)

docs.title: Active Validators List
docs.text: kiichaind q staking validators -oj --limit=2000 | jq '.validators[] | select(.status=="BOND_STATUS_BONDED")' | jq -r '(.tokens|tonumber/pow(10;6)|floor|tostring) + " " + .description.moniker' | sort -gr | nl

docs.title: Check Validator key
docs.text: [[ $(kiichaind q staking validator $VALOPER_ADDRESS -oj | jq -r .consensus_pubkey.key) = $(kiichaind status | jq -r .ValidatorInfo.PubKey.value) ]] && echo -e "Your key status is ok" || echo -e "Your key status is error"

docs.title: Edit Validator
docs.text:
kiichaind tx staking edit-validator \
--commission-rate 0.05 \
--new-moniker "$MONIKER" \
--identity "" \
--details "Kyronode for all" \
--from $WALLET \
--chain-id oro_1336-1 \
--fees 1250000000akii \
-y

docs.title: 🚀 Node Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and run a Kiichain Node. 🔗 Website | Discord | Twitter

docs.title: 📋 Recommended Specifications
docs.text: Component Minimum Recommended CPU 4 Cores 4+ Cores RAM 8 GB 8+ GB Storage 1 TB NVMe SSD 2 TB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04 Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.23.8"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin
